abstract: In this paper we prove that generalized bent (gbent) functions defined on \(\mathbb {F}_2^n\) with values in \(\mathbb {Z}_{2^k}\) are regular, and show connections between the (generalized) Walsh spectrum of these functions and their components. Moreover we analyze generalized bent and semibent functions with values in \(\mathbb {Z}_{16}\) in detail, extending earlier results on gbent functions with values in \(\mathbb {Z}_4\) and \(\mathbb {Z}_8\).
meta: Conference: International Workshop on the Arithmetic of Finite Fields
